channel.title: Worlds (this is relly hard one i thought)
channel.description:
Hello today i have another question.
How i can make more worlds in my client.Like world 1,world 2,world 3,world 4,world 5 etc... Please help me :D
Have a nice day!
Rebornscape :D

item.source: Worlds (this is relly hard one i thought)

item.title: Worlds (this is relly hard one i thought)
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

First, never host more then one server on one computer unless your an idiot. It defeats the whole point of having multiple worlds and just adds more overhead.

If you want to have multiple worlds, you need you have one computer for each world, and if you’re hosting them from the same location they each must listen on another port. Also, you need a method of sharing the accounts (such as a database like MySQL), and you will need some way to ensure that no player is on two worlds at the same time. Additionally, you need someway to make the friends list work between worlds. You need to write a Master Server that all the worlds connect to in order to do this. I’ve already done all this.

I personally don’t think your up for this.

Read full topic
item.source: Worlds (this is relly hard one i thought)

item.title: Worlds (this is relly hard one i thought)
item.dc:creator: @JoshB JoshB™
item.description:
@JoshB wrote:

I tried this before but gave up… Look in your client’s client.java and find the method that states you must be member to log into this world; then go into your server’s client.java and in process() add something like If(Playerrights <= 1) { outwite.(12) }
Bascially saying if your playerrights are less then one it tells the client to put out the number that the client has for “You must be a member to log into this world”. I do believe it’s twelve?

Read full topic
